title: Allow UWP App to access packaged COM if UWP App is packaged in Desktop Bridge
body: Packaged COM (https://blogs.windows.com/buildingapps/2017/04/13/com-server-ole-document-support-desktop-bridge/#KgekWJeWFmOwUZRb.97) allows exposing out-of-proc COM objects using desktop bridge, however these COM objects are not accessible from UWP apps, even if the UWP apps are packaged into same desktop bridge exposes the COM objects.
